00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 
00027 using NyFolder;
00028 
00029 namespace NyFolder.Utils {
00031     public static class Paths {
00032         private static string home_directory = null;
00033 
00035         public static void Initialize () {
00036             home_directory = Environment.GetFolderPath(
00037                                 Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal);
00038 
00039             FileUtils.CreateDirectory(ConfigDirectory);
00040             FileUtils.CreateDirectory(UserPluginDirectory);
00041             FileUtils.CreateDirectory(DefaultSharedDirectory);
00042         }
00043 
00045         public static string UserSharedDirectory (string username) {
00046             string path = Path.Combine(DefaultSharedDirectory, username);
00047             FileUtils.CreateDirectory(path);
00048             return(path);
00049         }
00050 
00052         public static string HomeDirectory {
00053             get { return(home_directory); }
00054         }
00055 
00057         public static string ConfigDirectory {
00058             get { return(Path.Combine(home_directory, ".nyFolder-1.x")); }
00059         }
00060 
00062         public static string UserPluginDirectory {
00063             get { return(Path.Combine(ConfigDirectory, "Plugins")); }
00064         }
00065 
00067         public static string DefaultSharedDirectory {
00068             get {return(Path.Combine(ConfigDirectory, "Shared")); }
00069         }
00070 
00072         public static string SystemDirectory {
00073             get { return(NyFolder.Info.InstallDirectory); }
00074         }
00075 
00077         public static string SystemPluginDirectory {
00078             get { return(Path.Combine(SystemDirectory, "Plugins")); }
00079         }
00080     }
00081 }
